arts.ttl: Marseille predicted XI v Ajax: Leonardo Balerdi out?
arts.sum: Olympique de Marseille captain Leonardo Balerdi could miss out on tonight’s UEFA Champions League match against Ajax Amsterdam. The exact nature of Balerdi’s injury is unclear, however, he is touch-and-go…

arts.ttl: Champions League Matchday 2 Predictions: Thriller in store at the Metropolitano
arts.sum: James Mason has picked out a score prediction for all 18 matches taking place on Matchday 2 of the Champions League.

arts.ttl: ‘Marseille can compete in the Champions League’ – Roberto De Zerbi ahead of Ajax test
arts.sum: Roberto De Zerbi was today present in his pre-match press conference attended by Get French Football News as Marseille prepare to face Dutch giants Ajax in the UEFA Champions League…

arts.ttl: Marseille vs Ajax predictions: Ajax to suffer at the hands of Aubameyang
arts.sum: Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang has nejoyed success against Ajax in the past and can make his mark for Marseille on Tuesday evening according to Ross Kilvington.
